biography.bio: Certainly one of France's supreme farceurs in the classic tradition, comedian Pierre Richard was born to an uppercrust family with an embarrassing riches of middle names as he was christened Pierre Richard Maurice Charles Leopold Defays. Working and building up his trade at the Paris Music Hall in the early years, he appeared in small movie roles thoughout most of the 60s. In the 70s, however, he aimed his genius directly towards film and succeeded beyond the wildest expectations. Directing and co-writing many of his slapstick vehicles, his characters often have taken on an hilariously guileless persona and, coupled with his innate gift for klutzy physical comedy, have become an audience favorite for nearly four decades. His superior work in The Daydreamer (1970) and The Troubles of Alfred (1972) was immediately recognized and this led to the international crossover hit The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1973) in which Richard played a naive, innocent concert musician plucked by chance to become a superspy on a top secret mission. A potent association in the 1960s and 1970s with actor/producer/director Yves Robert and the 1980s with writer/director Francis Veber and actor Gerard Depardieu produced several comedy classics: Alexander (1967), The Return of the Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1974), The Goat (1981), Les Comperes (1983) and The Fugitives (1986). Many of Richard's classic comedies, including The Toy (1976), have spawned Hollywood remakes and imitations, though most pale compared to the originals.
biography.name: Pierre Richard

biography.bio: Aldo Maccione was born on November 27, 1935 in Turin, Italy. He is an actor, known for La leggenda di Al, John e Jack (2002), Perdiamoci di vista (1994) and The Chambermaid on the Titanic (1997).
biography.name: Aldo Maccione

biography.bio: Valérie Mairesse was born on June 8, 1955 in Paris, France. She is known for her work on Sacrifice (1986), Trilogy: Two (2002) and The Umbrella Coup (1980).
biography.name: Valérie Mairesse

biography.bio: Danielle Minazzoli is an actress, known for I'm Losing My Temper (1974), It's Not Me, It's Him (1980) and The Band (1970).
biography.name: Danielle Minazzoli

biography.bio: Annette Poivre was born on June 24, 1917 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Paule Marie Jeanne Perron. She was an actress, known for Quoi de neuf, Pussycat? (1965), Joy House (1964) and Taxi, roulotte et corrida (1958). She was married to Raymond Bussières. She died on June 2, 1988 in Paris.
biography.name: Annette Poivre

biography.bio: Marie-Christine Deshayes is an actress, known for It's Not Me, It's Him (1980), The French Woman (1977) and Attention les yeux! (1976).
biography.name: Marie-Christine Deshayes

biography.bio: Gérard Hernandez was born on January 20, 1933 in Valladolid, Spain. He is an actor and writer, known for Scènes de ménages (2009), Fantastic Planet (1973) and The Twelve Tasks of Asterix (1976).
biography.name: Gérard Hernandez

actors.character: Le vendeur de poteries au souk

biography.bio: Franca Valeri was born on July 31, 1920 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy as Alma Franca Maria Norsa. She is an actress and writer, known for Le signe de Vénus (1955), Parigi o cara (1962) and The Widower (1959). She was previously married to Vittorio Caprioli.
biography.name: Franca Valeri

biography.bio: Henri Garcin was born on April 11, 1929 in Antwerp, Belgium as Anton Albers. He is an actor and writer, known for The Pink Panther (2006), The Woman Next Door (1981) and The Eighth Day (1996).
biography.name: Henri Garcin

biography.bio: Frédéric Arditi is an actor, known for L'extraordinaire ascension de Maurice Bellange (1979), It's Not Me, It's Him (1980) and Vivement dimanche (1998).
biography.name: Frédéric Arditi

biography.bio: Raouf Ben Amor is an actor, known for Frantic (1988), Day of the Falcon (2011) and Aziza (1980).
biography.name: Raouf Ben Amor

biography.bio: Joel Bienfait is an actor, known for It's Not Me, It's Him (1980).
biography.name: Joel Bienfait

biography.bio: Franck-Olivier Bonnet was born on June 21, 1946 in Tournai, Belgium as Jean-Paul Bonnet. He was an actor, known for Amélie (2001), Quest for Fire (1981) and Angel-A (2005). He died on March 25, 2013 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Franck-Olivier Bonnet

biography.bio: Bernard Born is an actor, known for The Party (1980), Le péril rampant (1982) and Le piège à loups (1981).
biography.name: Bernard Born

biography.bio: Bouboule was born as Alain Chevestrier. He is an actor, known for Les beaux dimanches (1980), 2 cloches dans la neige (1977) and Les bidasses au pensionnat (1978).
biography.name: Bouboule
